text: This world is cruel; therefore, I won't be.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Stephen Hawking

text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

text: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus
